pattern.title: Element use from external adapter type defined by external schema documents

assert.test: some $ref-namespace in namespace-uri-from-QName(resolve-QName(@ref, .)) satisfies nf:get-document-element(.)/xs:import[ $ref-namespace = xs:anyURI(@namespace) and @appinfo:externalImportIndicator]

rule.assert: Rule 9-51: An element reference that appears within an adapter type MUST have a target namespace that is imported as external.
